name: True OR False (itch) (RubyDev)
description:
An online game to play together with friends.
Trivia game in which you lie to each other. Inspired by casual multiplayer games like The Jackbox Party games.

Made for MMarmalade Jam of FH Salzburg in Winter 2021!

Follow me on twitter, I am developing an indie-rogue-lite: https://twitter.com/RubyBenji
